lead_paragraph: The sports broadcaster has to pay about $19,000 to two people who interned there, a fine that sends a message about fair compensation, analysts say.
snippet: The sports broadcaster has to pay about $19,000 to two people who interned there, a fine that sends a message about fair compensation, analysts say.

headline.main: Australian Company Crocmedia Fined for Not Paying Interns
headline.print_headline: Australian Company Crocmedia Fined for Not Paying Interns
